## Cisco-IOS-XR-mpls-te-cfg.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)

### Description

Removal of leaf 'oor-recovery-duration' and add back as grouping 'OOR-RECOVERY-DURATION', the grouping is used by multiple parents.
